property.value: Your J-Ruler gains [Target Attack]. {Rest}: Your J-Ruler gains [+200/+200] until end of turn. card.name: Galahad, the Son of the God

property.name: Trait

property.name: Text
property.value: Whenever this card attacks, you gain 500 life. When this card is put into a graveyard from your field, rest target resonator your opponent controls.

card.name: Gawain, the Knight of the Sun

property.name: Trait
property.value: Knight of the Round Table

property.name: Text
property.value: Other Knight of the Round Table resonators you control gain [+200/+200]. Whenever this card attacks or blocks, rest target resonator.

property.name: Text
property.value: Whenever you gain life, target resonator gains [+300/+300] until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: [Flying] (This card cannot be blocked by J/resonators without [Flying].) You may pay {2} less to play this card for each resonator you control that entered your field this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters your field, search your main deck for a card named "Herald of Sacred Queen", reveal it and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your main deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: [Trigger] When a resonator your opponent controls attacks or blocks: This card deals 500 damage to target attacking or blocking resonator. If your control a J-Ruler, this card deals damage equal to its ATK instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Rest target resonator. Resonators you control gain [+400/+400] until end of turn.

card.name: Perceval, the Seeker of Holy Grail

property.name: Trait
property.value: Knight of the Round Table

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters your field, reveal the top five cards of your main deck. You may put a Regalia or Knight of the Round Table among them into your hand. Put the rest to the bottom of your main deck in any order. Banish this card: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target J-ruler or Knight of the Round Table until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target J/resonator you control gains [+200/+200] until end of turn. You gain 200 life.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters your field, you gain 400 life.

property.name: Text
property.value: As long as you control another Knight of the Round Table, this card gains [Swiftness]. Whenever this card attacks, resonators you control gain [+100/+0] until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: {Rest}: Target resonator with total cost 2 or less gains [+200/+200] until end of turn.

property.name: Text

property.name: Text
property.value: Players cannot gain life. Whenever a resonator is put into a graveyard from a field, this card deals 100 damage to each player.

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose one - This card deals 500 damage to target resonator; or destroy target resonator that was dealt damage this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: [Target Attack] (This card can attack recovered J/resonators.)

property.name: Text
property.value: [Flying] (This card cannot be blocked by J/resonators without [Flying].) You may pay {1} less to play this card for each resonator put into a graveyard from your field this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: This card deals 400 damage to each resonator your opponent controls. Then you may put a fire resonator with total cost 3 or less from your hand into your field. It gains [Swiftness] until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: [Flying] (This card cannot be blocked by J/resonators without [Flying].) {F}: This card gains [+200/+0] until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: [Trigger] When a J/resonator you control attacks: Target resonator cannot block until end of turn. If you control a J-ruler, this card deals, damage equal to its ATK to that resonator.

property.name: Text
property.value: {Rest}, banish a resonator: Draw two cards, then discard a card. {F}, {Rest}: Target resonator you control gains [+400/+400] until end of turn. When it deals or is dealt damage this turn, banish it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your J-Ruler gains [Swiftness]. {Rest}: Until end of turn, if your J-ruler would deal damage, it deals that much +200 damage instead. If your J-Ruler is "Melgis, the One Charmed by the Demon Sword", it gains [Imperishable] until end of turn and you may pay {2} less ot play it's God's Art abilities this turn. Banish a resonator: Recover this card. Discard another copy of "Laevateinn, the Demon Sword": Produce {F}. Banish this card: Your J-Ruler gains [Imperishable] this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: [Swiftness] (This card can attack and play its {Rest} abilities the same turn it enters a field.) As you choose a card to attack, you must choose this card if able. Whenever this card attacks, if this card's ATK is 1000 or more, this card deals 700 damage to target resonator. {F}: This card gains [+100/+0] until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: [First Strike] (While attacking, this card deals battle damage first to the blocked or attacked object.) When this card enters your field, put the top card of your magic stone into your magic stone area. {F}, banish a magic stone or resonator: This card deals 300 damage to target resonator. God's Art<Unleash the Demon Sword> {4}{F}{F}: Destroy target resonator. This card gains [+X/+0] until end of turn, where X is the ATK of the destroyed resonator. Play God's Art <Unleash the Demon Sword> only once per game.

property.value: This card cannot attack. When this card is put into a graveyard from your field, search your main deck for a fire resonator, reveal it and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your main deck.
